Death and destruction everywhere!
 
 Humans sickening and collapsing.
 
 A scourge reaches out to destroy the lands, the waters, the atmosphere, everything!
 
 Will OILzilla be stopped before it reaches its roadway to whole wide world, the Loop, or will it go on to ravage the entire Earth!
 
 Tune in forever!
